name: Khronos-X
description:
Battle the invading Ananke Armada in this twin-stick shooter where you can slow time to get the advantage over your enemies. Blast your way to a high-score before the ever-present timer reaches zero.

Shoot enemies, collect shards. When you collect enough shards an arrow will appear to point to a time extension pick up. Are you good enough to keep the fight going?

Controls (KB&M or gamepad):

Left stick or W,A,S,D = move
Right-stick or mouse and LMB = aim and shoot
RMB or Right trigger on pad = slow time (energy allowing)

Esc or gamepad start button = pause

Gamepad is recommended!

New for November 2016 - For £2.00 (or whatever that is in your local currency), get the game AND the source-code. Do with it what you wish. Steal parts, re-write parts, remix the entire game and re-release is... Whatever you want! As long as you don't just replace my name with yours that is :)

I WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU! Follow me on Twitter - @MrTom. Do you like the game? Did you hate it? Did you see anything break? Is your face getting hot and itchy? Let me know!
